title.value: Cross-version Extension `R5.NutritionOrder.oralDiet` for use in FHIR R4

description.value: This cross-version extension represents the FHIR R5 element `NutritionOrder.oralDiet` for use in FHIR R4.

purpose.value:
This extension is part of the cross-version definitions generated to enable use of the element `NutritionOrder.oralDiet` as defined in FHIR R5 in FHIR R4.
The source element is defined as: `NutritionOrder.oralDiet` 0..1 `BackboneElement`
Across FHIR versions, the element set has been mapped as: * R5: `NutritionOrder.oralDiet` 0..1 `BackboneElement` * R4B: `NutritionOrder.oralDiet` 0..1 `BackboneElement` * R4: `NutritionOrder.oralDiet` 0..1 `BackboneElement`
Following are the generation technical comments: Element `NutritionOrder.oralDiet` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `NutritionOrder.oralDiet`, but has no comparisons.
